entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 17 at 10:20PM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...ICY SPOTS ON ROADWAYS INTO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... Any remaining standing water and slush will freeze solid overnight. This may result in icy spots developing on roadways as temperatures will be dropping into the 20s overnight. This is particularly true in areas that received a brief burst of snow earlier this evening; which may cover icy patches beneath it.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 17 at 6:08PM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...BLACK ICE POSSIBLE TUESDAY MORNING... Temperatures will be well below freezing for much of the night. Any remaining wet spots on roadways will freeze potentially leading to black ice. Temperatures will rise above freezing by late morning Tuesday. Motorists are urged to use caution.
